Package org.thinkit.api.catalog

Interface Catalog<E extends Catalog<E>>

Type Parameters:
E - Catalog element
public interface Catalog<E extends Catalog<E>>
An interface that defines common operations of the Catalog.
Since:
1.0

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    default boolean equalsByCode​(int code)
    Check whether the code value of the Enum element is equal to the value passed as an argument.
    int getCode()
    Return a code value.
    static <E extends Catalog<E>>
    E    		 getEnum​(Class<? extends Catalog<E>> clazz, int code)
    The code values defined for each element of the Enum class that implements the interface are compared with the numbers passed as arguments, and the Enum element that matches the values is returned.
    static <E extends Catalog<E>>
    Map<Integer,​E>    		 getMap​(Class<? extends Catalog<E>> clazz)
    The code value defined for each element of the Enum class that implements the interface is compared with the number specified as an argument.
    static <E extends Catalog<E>>
    List<E>    		 getOrderedList​(Class<? extends Catalog<E>> clazz)
    Each element of the Enum class that implements this interface is sorted based on the code value defined for each element.
    static <E extends Catalog<E>>
    boolean    		 hasCode​(Class<? extends Catalog<E>> clazz, int code)
    This function determines whether the code value specified as an argument is defined in each element of the Enum class that implements the interface concerned.
    static <E extends Catalog<E>>
    Stream<? extends Catalog<E>>    		 stream​(Class<? extends Catalog<E>> clazz)
    Converts the element group defined in the clazz argument to a Stream and returns it.
    default E toEnum()
    Convert to an Enum class object.

  • Method Details

    • getCode

      int getCode()
      Return a code value.
      Returns:
      Code value

    • toEnum

      default E toEnum()
      Convert to an Enum class object.
      Returns:
      Converted an Enum class object

    • equalsByCode

      default boolean equalsByCode​(int code)
      Check whether the code value of the Enum element is equal to the value passed as an argument.
      Parameters:
      code - Code value
      Returns:
      If the number passed as an argument is equal to the code value of the Enum element, true , otherwise false

    • getOrderedList

      static <E extends Catalog<E>> List<E> getOrderedList​(Class<? extends Catalog<E>> clazz)
      Each element of the Enum class that implements this interface is sorted based on the code value defined for each element. The result of the sorting process is converted into a list structure with the order in which it is displayed and returned.
      Type Parameters:
      E - Catalog element
      Parameters:
      clazz - Enum class object to be operated on
      Returns:
      A list containing the values sorted based on the code values defined for each element of the Enum class

    • getEnum

      static <E extends Catalog<E>> E getEnum​(Class<? extends Catalog<E>> clazz, int code)
      The code values defined for each element of the Enum class that implements the interface are compared with the numbers passed as arguments, and the Enum element that matches the values is returned.
      Type Parameters:
      E - Catalog element
      Parameters:
      clazz - Enum class object to be operated on
      code - Code value
      Returns:
      Enum element with a code value equal to the number specified as an argument

    • getMap

      static <E extends Catalog<E>> Map<Integer,​E> getMap​(Class<? extends Catalog<E>> clazz)
      The code value defined for each element of the Enum class that implements the interface is compared with the number specified as an argument. Return the Enum element whose value matches the code value as a key.
      Type Parameters:
      E - Catalog element
      Parameters:
      clazz - Enum class object to be operated on
      Returns:
      Map containing an Enum element with a code value equal to the number specified as an argument as a code key

    • hasCode

      static <E extends Catalog<E>> boolean hasCode​(Class<? extends Catalog<E>> clazz, int code)
      This function determines whether the code value specified as an argument is defined in each element of the Enum class that implements the interface concerned.
      Type Parameters:
      E - Catalog element
      Parameters:
      clazz - Enum class object to be operated on
      code - Code value
      Returns:
      true if there is an Enum element with a code value equal to the number specified as an argument, otherwise false

    • stream

      static <E extends Catalog<E>> Stream<? extends Catalog<E>> stream​(Class<? extends Catalog<E>> clazz)
      Converts the element group defined in the clazz argument to a Stream and returns it.
      Type Parameters:
      E - Catalog element
      Parameters:
      clazz - Enum class object to be operated on
      Returns:
      Streams of the Enum class
